amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 1721 to allow discovery to proceed while motions are pending.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 115-29 to strike section 1721 to allow discovery to proceed while motions are pending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 230 (Roll no. 142).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 230 (Roll no. 142).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Soto.
